verbs.description: President Trump and Vice President Pence [V: are] moving their post - primary Indiana visit to a venue with more seats , all the bigger to begin their campaign attacks on Democratic Sen. Joe Donnelly .

[ARG0: President Trump and Vice President Pence] are [V: moving] [ARG1: their post - primary Indiana visit to a venue with more seats , all the bigger] [ARGM-PRP: to begin their campaign attacks on Democratic Sen. Joe Donnelly] .
